column3: School of Mathematics and Computer Science
column5: Advanced Software Technology Course OverviewAdvanced software technology is critical to the functioning of modern society. Computing systems can be found in science and engineering, medicine design and manufacturing, commerce and public service. Software technology dictates how these systems operate and how they are used.The MSc in Advanced Software Technology is suitable you if you are a Computer Science or Software Engineering graduate or if you have relevant experience from a first degree. It may also be suitable if you have substantial experience of working in a related environment and wish to develop your knowledge.
column7: Please visit our website for the Advanced Software Technology course fee information.
column9: 1 year full-time; 2 years part-time; 3 years part-time
